mapper.select: SELECT reviews.id, users.name AS userName, reviews.description, reviews.score, reviews.created_at AS createdAt FROM reviews JOIN users ON reviews.user_id = users.id WHERE study_cafe_id = #{studyCafeId} ORDER BY reviews.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews (user_id, study_cafe_id, description, score) VALUES (#{userId}, #{studyCafeId}, #{description}, #{score})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM reviews WHERE id = ( SELECT id FROM ( SELECT id FROM reviews WHERE id = #{reviewId} AND user_id = #{userId} ) sub_query )
